item.title: 'Big Short' Steve Eisman is getting worried about the AI trade
item.description: Eisman encountered a theory suggesting that as large language models continue to scale, their performance gains could begin to diminish.

item.title: Goldman Sachs leads investment in software delivery startup Harness at $5.5 billion valuation
item.description: Harness CEO Jyoti Bansal wants to eventually take Harness public after he sold his previous startup, AppDynamics, to Cisco just before a planned IPO.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves premarket: Oracle, Oxford Industries, Adobe, Gemini Space Station & more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in early trading.

item.title: The Fed is the most divided it's been in more than six years
item.description: Three members of the Federal Open Market Committee didn't agree with the central bank's quarter percentage point cut on Wednesday.

item.title: Night owl bitcoin traders: Soon there'll be an ETF just for you
item.description: If approved, the Nicholas Bitcoin and Treasuries AfterDark ETF would buy and sell bitcoin-linked financial instruments outside U.S. trading hours.
